text: Saram Entertainment (Korean: 사람엔터테인먼트) is an entertainment company in South Korea, founded by Lee So-young in 2006. The company specializes in artist management and film production. ==Current artists== ===Actors=== * Byun Yo-han * Cho Jin-woong * Choi Soo-young * Choi Won-young * David Lee McInnis * Gong Myung * Han Ye-ri * Hong Ki-joon * HoYeon Jung * Jeong So-ri * Kim Jae-young * Kim Sung-kyu * Kim Yu An * Kwon Yul * Lee Ga-sub * Lee Hanee * Lee Je-hoon * Lee Sung-wook * Lee Woon-san * Moon Dong-hyeok * Park Kyu-young * Park Ye-jin * Shim Dal-gi * Uhm Jung-hwa * Yoo Hee-jae * Ki Hong Lee ==Films== === 2010s === {| class="wikitable sortable" ! scope="col" style="width:1em;"| Year ! scope="col" style="width:10em;"| Title ! scope="col" style="width:10em;"| Director ! scope="col" style="width:10em;"| Associated Production ! scope="col" style="width:10em;"| Distributor |- |2012 |Ghost Sweepers | Shin Jung-won |Dasepo Club | Next Entertainment World |- |2013 |An Ethics Lesson | Park Myoung-rang | TPS Company | Lotte Cultureworks |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:Talent agencies of South Korea Category:Talent agencies Category:Film production companies of South Korea
title: Saram Entertainment
